meta.job_title: Pelvic Floor and Orthopedic Physical Therapist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate, plan, and implement treatment programs for pelvic floor and orthopedic patients referred by physicians.
Treat a variety of specialties, including orthopedic, pediatric, neurologic, and sports medicine patients.
Establish strong relationships with each patient to help them exceed their functional goals.
Participate in community relationship building and maintenance.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of APTA or CAPTE approved physical therapy program
Basic Life Support Certification from the American Heart Association
